title: Did immigrants beat the Nobel Prize in the United States in 2016 and 2017?
subtitle: Born abroad, scientists and economists from the United States have won a remarkable number of Nobel Prizes in the past two years, but not all of them.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Of the six Nobel Prize laureates for Science in the United States in 2017, all were immigrants; all Nobel laureates in the United States in 2016 were also born abroad.
